forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. A few peeks of sunshine possible. High near 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. A few peeks of sunshine possible. High 61F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High near 15C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 60F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
